Info
Defined class CfgBase with attribute(s) and method(s). Load ATS configuration/information, setup ATS CL interface.
class ats_utilities.config_io.cfg.CfgBase(informations_file, verbose=False)[source]¶

Bases: object

Defined class CfgBase with attribute(s) and method(s). Load ATS configuration/information, setup ATS CL interface. It defines:

attributes:
__verbose - enable/disable verbose option.
tool_operational - control ATS operational functionality.
cfg2obj - in API for informations.
obj2cfg - out API for informations.
option_parser - option parser for ATS.
methods:
__init__ - initial constructor.
is_tool_ok - checking is tool operational.
__str__ - str dunder method for object CfgBase.
VERBOSE = 'ats_utilities::config_io::cfg'¶
is_tool_ok()[source]¶

Checking is tool operational.

Returns:boolean status, True (yes) | False.
Return type:<bool>
Exceptions:None
